short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This small extension allows for quick access to California apartment industry news, as well the complete CAA knowledge base.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The California Apartment Association is the nation’s largest statewide trade group representing owners, investors, developers, managers and suppliers of apartment communities. Our staff — based in Sacramento and with strategic hubs throughout California — includes experts in rental housing law, legal analysts, state and local lobbyists, member-service representatives and media-outreach specialists. 

This extension will help keep you updated on news from around California related to the apartment industry, as well as providing quick access to everything in our online database, including forms, white papers, issue insights, and FAQs.
